rules_text:
Trample
[i]Blood Fury[/i] – As long as you have less life than your starting life total, if a triggered ability of Panette, Classy Brawler would trigger, it triggers an additional time.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Panette deals combat damage to a player, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
